abort.cloud_not_connected: Not connected to Home Assistant Cloud.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.
abort.webhook_not_internet_accessible: Your Home Assistant instance needs to be accessible from the internet to receive webhook messages.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to setup [Webhooks with Twilio]({twilio_url}).

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST
- Content Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) on how to configure automations to handle incoming data.

user.description: Do you want to start setup?
user.title: Set up the Twilio Webhook
